SEARCH
Package com.tloj.game.game

Class PlayerRoomVisitor

java.lang.Object
com.tloj.game.game.PlayerRoomVisitor
public class PlayerRoomVisitor extends Object
PlayerRoomVisitor class to handle the visit different types of rooms in the game. It implements the Visitor pattern

    • PlayerRoomVisitor

      public PlayerRoomVisitor(Character player)
      Constructs a PlayerRoomVisitor object with the given player character.

  • Method Details

    • visit

      public void visit(StartRoom room)
      Visit method for a StartRoom.
      Parameters:
      room - The StartRoom to visit. Visits a start room, clears the room, and sets the game state to MOVING

    • visit

      public void visit(BossRoom room)
      Visit method for a BossRoom.
      Parameters:
      room - The BossRoom to visit. Visits a boss room, triggers a fight with the boss, changes the music and sets the game state to FIGHTING_BOSS

    • visit

      public void visit(HealingRoom room)
      Visit method for a HealingRoom.
      Parameters:
      room - The HealingRoom to visit. Visits a healing room, heals the player, and sets the game state to HEALING_ROOM

    • visit

      public void visit(HostileRoom room)
      Visit method for a HostileRoom.
      Parameters:
      room - The HostileRoom to visit. Visits a hostile room, triggers a fight with the mob, and sets the game state to FIGHTING_MOB

    • visit

      public void visit(LootRoom room)
      Visit method for a LootRoom.
      Parameters:
      room - The LootRoom to visit. Visits a loot room, adds the item to the player's inventory, and clears the room

    • visit

      public void visit(TrapRoom room)
      Visit method for a TrapRoom.
      Parameters:
      room - The TrapRoom to visit. Visits a trap room, triggers the trap, and executes its side effect

    • visit

      public void visit(EndRoom room)
      Visit method for a EndRoom.
      Parameters:
      room - The EndRoom to visit. Visits an end room, sets the game state to WIN, and displays game win message
